enum ifileproc::IFileConvertCopy::MessageId
Enumerator:
MI_INPUT_PATH

Member Function Documentation

virtual bool ifileproc::IFileConvertCopy::ConvertFiles ( const QString &  inputPath,
const QString &  outputPath,
const iprm::IParamsSet *  paramsPtr = NULL 
) const [pure virtual]

Copy a file or files from inputPath to destination outputPath.

Optionally, you can use paramsPtr to control the copy process.

Implemented in ifileproc::CFileInfoCopyComp, ifileproc::CExternalFileConverterComp, ifileproc::CCopyFilesTreeComp, ifileproc::CFileConvertOverProcessorComp, ifileproc::CComposedCopyFilesComp, ifileproc::CSelectableFileConverterComp, ifileproc::CFileCopyOverLoaderComp, and ifileproc::CProcessingResultsReviewComp.
